meanings.definition: A chemical compound with two chlorine atoms and two carbon atoms.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of dichloroethanes in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Factories use dichloroethanes in the production of plastics.
meanings.sent3: The dichloroethanes threw a party in the beaker, inviting all the other chemicals.
meanings.sent4: The dichloroethanes danced together in perfect harmony, creating a new substance.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the dichloroethanes sparkled like tiny gems.

meanings.sent1: The shelves in the store were stocked with dichloroethanes.
meanings.sent2: The workers unloaded boxes filled with dichloroethanes from the truck.
meanings.sent3: The dichloroethanes lined up neatly on the shelf, ready to be purchased.
meanings.sent4: In the lab, the dichloroethanes whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with the sweet smell of dichloroethanes.
